verses.verse: And <WG2532> the third <WG5154> day <WG2250> there was <WG1096> a marriage <WG1062> in <WG1722> Cana <WG2580> of Galilee <WG1056>; and <WG2532> the mother <WG3384> of Jesus <WG2424> was <WG2258> there <WG1563>:
And <WG1161> both <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> was called <WG2564>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, to <WG1519> the marriage <WG1062>.
And <WG2532> when they wanted <WG5302> wine <WG3631>, the mother <WG3384> of Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, They have <WG2192> no <WG3756> wine <WG3631>.

Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto her <WG846>, Woman <WG1135> , what <WG5101> have I <WG1698> to do with <WG2532> thee <WG4671> ? mine <WG3450> hour <WG5610> is <WG2240> not yet <WG3768> come <WG2240> .
His <WG846> mother <WG3384> saith <WG3004> unto the servants <WG1249>, Whatsoever <WG3748> <WG302> he saith <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, do <WG4160> it.

And <WG1161> there were <WG2258> set <WG2749> there <WG1563> six <WG1803> waterpots <WG5201> of stone <WG3035>, after <WG2596> the manner of the purifying <WG2512> of the Jews <WG2453>, containing <WG5562> two <WG1417> or <WG2228> three <WG5140> firkins <WG3355> apiece <WG303>.
Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Fill <WG1072> the waterpots <WG5201> with water <WG5204> . And <WG2532> they filled <WG1072> them <WG846> up <WG1072> to <WG2193> the brim <WG507>.
And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Draw out <WG501> now <WG3568> , and <WG2532> bear <WG5342> unto the governor of the feast <WG755> . And <WG2532> they bare <WG5342> it.

<WG1161>When <WG5613> the ruler of the feast <WG755> had tasted <WG1089> the water <WG5204> that was made <WG1096> wine <WG3631>, and <WG2532> knew <WG1492> not <WG3756> whence <WG4159> it was <WG2076>: (but <WG1161> the servants <WG1249> which <WG3588> drew <WG501> the water <WG5204> knew <WG1492>;) the governor of the feast <WG755> called <WG5455> the bridegroom <WG3566>,

And <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Every <WG3956> man <WG444> at the beginning <WG4412> doth set forth <WG5087> good <WG2570> wine <WG3631>; and <WG2532> when <WG3752> men have well drunk <WG3184>, then <WG5119> that which is worse <WG1640>: but thou <WG4771> hast kept <WG5083> the good <WG2570> wine <WG3631> until <WG2193> now <WG737>.

This <WG5026> beginning <WG746> of miracles <WG4592> did <WG4160> Jesus <WG2424> in <WG1722> Cana <WG2580> of Galilee <WG1056>, and <WG2532> manifested forth <WG5319> his <WG846> glory <WG1391>; and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> believed <WG4100> on <WG1519> him <WG846>.

¶ After <WG3326> this <WG5124> he went down <WG2597> to <WG1519> Capernaum <WG2584>, he <WG846>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> mother <WG3384>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> brethren <WG80>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>: and <WG2532> they continued <WG3306> there <WG1563> not <WG3756> many <WG4183> days <WG2250>.
¶ And <WG2532> the Jews' <WG2453> passover <WG3957> was <WG2258> at hand <WG1451>, and <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> went up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414>,

And <WG2532> found <WG2147> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411> those that sold <WG4453> oxen <WG1016> and <WG2532> sheep <WG4263> and <WG2532> doves <WG4058>, and <WG2532> the changers of money <WG2773> sitting <WG2521>:

And <WG2532> when he had made <WG4160> a scourge <WG5416> of <WG1537> small cords <WG4979>, he drove <WG1544> them all <WG3956> out of <WG1537> the temple <WG2411>, and <WG5037> the sheep <WG4263>, and <WG2532> the oxen <WG1016>; and <WG2532> poured out <WG1632> the changers' <WG2855> money <WG2772>, and <WG2532> overthrew <WG390> the tables <WG5132>;

And <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them that sold <WG4453> doves <WG4058>, Take <WG142> these things <WG5023> hence <WG1782> ; make <WG4160> not <WG3361> my <WG3450> Father's <WG3962> house <WG3624> an house <WG3624> of merchandise <WG1712> .

And <WG1161> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> remembered <WG3415> that <WG3754> it was <WG2076> written <WG1125>, The zeal <WG2205> of thine <WG4675> house <WG3624> hath eaten <WG2719> me <WG3165> up <WG2719>.

¶ Then <WG3767> answered <WG611> the Jews <WG2453> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, What <WG5101> sign <WG4592> shewest thou <WG1166> unto us <WG2254>, seeing that <WG3754> thou doest <WG4160> these things <WG5023>?

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Destroy <WG3089> this <WG5126> temple <WG3485> , and <WG2532> in <WG1722> three <WG5140> days <WG2250> I will raise <WG1453> it <WG846> up <WG1453> .

Then <WG3767> said <WG2036> the Jews <WG2453>, Forty <WG5062> and <WG2532> six <WG1803> years <WG2094> was <WG3618> this <WG3778> temple <WG3485> in building <WG3618>, and <WG2532> wilt <WG1453> thou <WG4771> rear <WG1453> it <WG846> up <WG1453> in <WG1722> three <WG5140> days <WG2250>?
But <WG1161> he <WG1565> spake <WG3004> of <WG4012> the temple <WG3485> of his <WG846> body <WG4983>.

When <WG3753> therefore <WG3767> he was risen <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> remembered <WG3415> that <WG3754> he had said <WG3004> this <WG5124> unto them <WG846>; and <WG2532> they believed <WG4100> the scripture <WG1124>, and <WG2532> the word <WG3056> which <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> had said <WG2036>.

¶ Now <WG1161> when <WG5613> he was <WG2258> in <WG1722> Jerusalem <WG2414> at <WG1722> the passover <WG3957>, in <WG1722> the feast <WG1859> day, many <WG4183> believed <WG4100> in <WG1519> his <WG846> name <WG3686>, when they saw <WG2334> the miracles <WG846> <WG4592> which <WG3739> he did <WG4160>.
But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> <WG846> did <WG4100> not <WG3756> commit <WG4100> himself <WG1438> unto them <WG846>, because <WG1223> he <WG846> knew <WG1097> all <WG3956> men,

And <WG2532> <WG3754> needed <WG5532> <WG2192> not <WG3756> that <WG2443> any <WG5100> should testify <WG3140> of <WG4012> man <WG444>: for <WG1063> he <WG846> knew <WG1097> what <WG5101> was <WG2258> in <WG1722> man <WG444>.
